summary: This document is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and AT&T's legal team regarding a subpoena for a records custodian to testify at a trial starting November 29, 2021. The communications concern the logistics of obtaining testimony and records related to AT&T file #227815.001.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The prosecutor from the Southern District of New York is coordinating with AT&T to secure a records custodian as a witness for a trial beginning November 29, 2021.

events.title: Trial Start Date
events.description: A trial is scheduled to begin on this date, for which the prosecution is seeking a records custodian from AT&T to testify.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The prosecution is preparing for a trial starting November 29, 2021, requiring testimony from an AT&T records custodian.
The case involves AT&T file #227815.001, which is related to an 'Affidavit for purged records'.
Communications are between the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and AT&T's Global Legal Demand Center.
A subpoena was issued to AT&T to produce a witness for the trial.
